query: SELECT MIM.ObjectNumber AS 'CODIGO',STM.StringText AS 'NOMBRE',MIP.Price AS 'PRECIO',MID.SequenceNum AS '# Def',MIM.HierStrucID AS 'Jerarquia Master',MID.HierStrucID AS 'Jerarquia Def',MIP.HierStrucID AS 'Jerarquia Price',HU.HierUnitID,HS.ZoneType AS 'ZONA',HU.PropertyID AS 'PUNTO', HU.RevCtrID AS 'RVC', HU.ObjectNumber FROM MENU_ITEM_MASTER MIM INNER JOIN MENU_ITEM_DEFINITION MID ON MIM.MenuItemMasterID = MID.MenuItemMasterID INNER JOIN MENU_ITEM_PRICE MIP ON MID.MenuItemDefID = MIP.MenuItemDefID INNER JOIN STRING_TABLE ST ON ST.StringNumberID = MID.Name1ID INNER JOIN STRING_TABLE STM ON STM.StringNumberID = MIM.NameID INNER JOIN HIERARCHY_STRUCTURE HS ON MIP.HierStrucID = HS.HierStrucID INNER JOIN HIERARCHY_UNIT HU ON HS.HierUnitID = HU.HierUnitID WHERE Price IS NOT NULL AND MIM.ObjectNumber >99999 AND MID.MenuItemClassObjNum IS NOT NULL AND MID.MainLvl <> 00000000 AND MID.SubLvl <> 00000000 AND MID.HierStrucID = MIP.HierStrucID
condicion1: AND HU.RevCtrID IS NOT NULL ORDER BY MIM.ObjectNumber;
condicion2: AND HU.PropertyID IS NOT NULL ORDER BY MIM.ObjectNumber;
condicion3: AND HS.ZoneType IS NOT NULL ORDER BY MIM.ObjectNumber;
condicion4: AND HS.ZoneType IS NULL AND HU.PropertyID IS NULL ORDER BY MIM.ObjectNumber;
